section.title: opportunities creating new types for Opportunity Type
section.para: To create a new Opportunity Type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Opportunity Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to define the Opportunity Type.
Enter a brief description of the Opportunity Type.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating an Opportunity Type, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Opportunity Type and adds it to the master list of Opportunity Types.
